page.title: 04CLUBS
page.content:
1. What age group is your club mainly aimed at? 2. Does your club open on set days or everyday? 3. Is a fee charged to enter the club each time you visit or to hire a table? A : B : C : D : E 1. : : : : 21+ : ALL : 21+ : 18+ : 18+ : : : : 2. EVERY :EVERY :EVERY :EVERY :EVERY DAY : DAY : DAY : DAY : DAY : : : : 3. Â£1.50 : NO : Â£2 : NO : NO
RECREATION Recreation facilities are short in our area with the only park being Mengham park.The beach offers the most activities: Swimming, Sail Boarding, Water skiing etc.
